name: Contractors, Special Trade; not elsewhere classified
tcc: R for face-to-face transactions.\nT for nonâ€“face-to-face transactions.
description:
Special trade contractors that perform construction work not
elsewhere classified. Examples include awning installation, bathtub
refinishing, fence construction, fire escape installation, house moving,
home window replacement, garage door installation, floor covering
installation, ornamental metal work, swimming pool construction,
glasswork, well drilling, wallpaper services, waterproofing, and
construction welding.
